ComicInfo.Title: The Iceman Cometh
ComicInfo.Summary:
Loki sends an ice giant to Earth and attack. Prototype is the first to arrive and fight the beast, but realizes he needs assistance and calls in Ultraforce. The ice giant escapes and Black Knight tries to search for answers. He learns that Loki is behind the assault and wonders how he can stop him. He tries to contact his former teammates in the Avengers through mystical means but is unable to speak to anyone. Sersi suddenly arrives and attacks, being possessed by an INfinity Gem. Loki, meanwhile, looks over the ultras on the planet to divine where the Infinity Gems are so he can use them to destroy the Avengers.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-19 14:53:32. [CVDB41106]
